description: Update documentation to reflect the new --output-csv option for --list-models.

instructions: Locate the section in `docs/usage.md` that describes the `--list-models` command.
Add a new paragraph or bullet point within this section specifically for the `--output-csv` option.
Clearly state that `--output-csv` is an optional parameter for `--list-models`.
Explain that its purpose is to export the detailed information about the listed models into a CSV file.

Describe the type of information included in the CSV output (e.g., model ID, name, provider, context window, pricing, etc. - refer to the implementation in `src/ai_whisperer/main.py` if needed to confirm the exact fields).
Provide a clear example of how to use the command with the new option, for instance: `aiwhisperer --list-models --output-csv models.csv`.
Ensure the new documentation is consistent in style and formatting with the rest of the `docs/usage.md` file.
validation_criteria: The documentation for the `--list-models` command now includes a description of the `--output-csv` option.
The purpose of exporting to CSV is explained.
An example command using `--list-csv` is present.
The documentation mentions the kind of data that will be exported to the CSV file.
